prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Bass, Guitar, Synth Pad, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Bass, Guitar, and Synth Pad, but no Drums.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Piano, Bass, Guitar, and Synth Pad, omitting Drums.

Style 3:
This composition is Piano, Bass, Guitar, and Synth Pad only, without Drums.
